title: Person Of Interest Season 1 Trailer (Fan Made) - Manifest Destiny
author: solyentbrak1
comment: Wow. Seeing Fusco as a villain in the pilot really puts into perspective how far the characters of this series have come. Well done! I hope you make one for Seasons 2 and 3.

Awesome work man.
Love the show.

This was incredibly well put together! I was hoping it would end with that last Scene from Cura te Ipsum where the guy is begging Reese not to kill him. That would have been pretty BA. But I still love this trailer ! great work!
Great video man, awesome job, awesome show
Nice to see a fellow editor who likes POI!!! What do you think about the last three episodes? I think they were some of the best of the whole series! Great video, music fits very well, keep it up!
description:
Iv been wanting to make some POI vids since the show began but never got round to, so heres the first of hopefully 3 trailers! This was inspired by the Elysium trailers music

Footage:
Person of Interest Season 1

Music:
Hi Finesse - Radius
Zola Jesus - Manifest Destiny
